title: Matchsafe, early 20th century
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangle form with bulging sides and flared corners.  The front has a plain silver surface with illusionary relief scene of head of hairy dog peering through ripped hole in safe.  Dog is smoking with smoke trails off to right side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-217.
